item.title: A mess of its own making: Google nerfs second Pixel phone battery this year
item.description: People don’t upgrade phones every year anymore—longevity matters.

item.title: The original Pixel Fold is over $1,000 off on the last day of Prime Day
item.description: Not enough foldable phones are priced for people who just want to try them out without going broke. We used to love pointing readers to deals on the Microsoft Surface Duo, which have since gone extinc
